# ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Related Errors
- Ensure required materials are in inventory before attempting to insert into furnaces
- Check inventory for required items before attempting to place buildings

### Crafting Related Errors
- When crafting complex items like labs or science packs, ensure all prerequisite items and facilities are available
- Some items (like copper plates) require specific crafting facilities (furnaces) and cannot be crafted directly

### Building Placement Errors
- Check terrain compatibility before placing buildings (especially near water)
- Steam engines have specific placement requirements and cannot be placed on water tiles
- Ensure sufficient clear space for larger buildings like steam engines (3x5 tiles)

### Connection Errors
- Power generation components (pump, boiler, steam engine) need proper connections to function
- Ensure proper use of pipes to connect water-based buildings
- Use appropriate connection methods between entities

### API Usage Errors
- Building dimensions should be accessed directly rather than trying arithmetic operations on their attributes
- Use appropriate data types when working with building dimensions and positions
